id.description: Property. Unique identifier of the entity

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be WaterDevice

location.description: Geoproperty. Geojson reference to the item. It can be Point, LineString, Polygon, MultiPoint, MultiLineString or MultiPolygoProperty.

date.description: Property. Attribute present in data model DiagramLayoutVersion of subject dataModel.EnergyCIM with the description Profile creation date Form is YYYY-MM-DD for example for January 5, 2009 it is 2009-01-05. Default: ''.
